agents.name: Solution Architect
agents.description: System design, architecture decisions, scalability planning
agents.when_to_use: Architecture design, technology choices, system scalability planning

agents.name: Senior Backend Engineer
agents.description: API development, backend services, database design
agents.when_to_use: Backend implementation, API design, service development

agents.name: Senior Frontend Engineer
agents.when_to_use: Frontend development, UI implementation, user experience

agents.name: Dev Task Lifecycle Manager
agents.description: Task orchestration, workflow management, progress tracking
agents.when_to_use: Complex multi-step tasks, lifecycle management, task coordination

agents.name: Prime Orchestrator
agents.description: Master coordinator, workflow navigation, agent delegation
agents.when_to_use: Complex multi-agent workflows, project initialization, coordination

agents.name: Product Manager
agents.when_to_use: Feature requirements, PRD creation, product planning

agents.name: QA Engineer
agents.description: Testing strategy, test automation, quality assurance
agents.when_to_use: Test planning, quality verification, test automation

agents.name: Devils Advocate QA
agents.description: Adversarial testing, edge case discovery, assumption challenging
agents.when_to_use: Final verification, adversarial testing, edge case discovery

agents.name: Go/Kubernetes Skeptic
agents.description: Go code critique, K8s anti-patterns, best practices enforcement
agents.when_to_use: Go code review, Kubernetes configuration review

agents.name: Web Application Skeptic
agents.when_to_use: Frontend code review, web application security review

agents.name: Database Skeptic
agents.description: Schema design review, query optimization, data integrity
agents.when_to_use: Database schema review, migration review, query optimization

agents.name: Kubernetes Specialist
agents.when_to_use: Kubernetes issues, cluster configuration, K8s best practices

agents.name: Kubernetes/Docker Specialist
agents.description: Container optimization, orchestration patterns, Docker best practices
agents.when_to_use: Container optimization, Docker issues, orchestration patterns

usage_notes.adding_agents: Add new agents to the 'specialized' category for project-specific expertise
usage_notes.quality_gates: Quality gate agents are mandatory and can block deployment
usage_notes.extensibility: The specialized category is designed for project customization
